summary.span: 定义并表示动态类上的方法（或构造函数）。

span.span: Defines and represents a method (or constructor) on a dynamic class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于全面地描述 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 中的一个方法，包括名称、 属性、 签名和方法的正文。The class is used to fully describe a method in Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), including the name, attributes, signature, and method body. 结合使用类在运行时创建类。It is used in conjunction with the class to create classes at runtime. ## 全局方法和类型成员方法Global methods and methods as type members 你可以使用反射发出定义全局方法以及作为类型成员定义方法。You can use reflection emit to define global methods and to define methods as type members. 定义方法的 Api 返回对象。The APIs that define methods return objects. ### 全局方法Global methods 通过使用定义的全局方法方法，它返回**MethodBuilder**对象。A global method is defined by using the method, which returns a **MethodBuilder** object. 全局方法必须是静态的。Global methods must be static. 如果动态模块包含全局性方法，必须保持的动态模块或包含的动态程序集，因为公共语言运行时推迟整理之前所有的全局函数的动态模块之前调用方法已定义。If a dynamic module contains global methods, the method must be called before persisting the dynamic module or the containing dynamic assembly because the common language runtime postpones fixing up the dynamic module until all global functions have been defined. 通过使用定义的全局的本机方法方法。A global native method is defined by using the method. 平台调用 (PInvoke) 抽象或虚拟，不能声明方法。Platform invoke (PInvoke) methods must not be declared abstract or virtual. 运行时设置属性对于平台调用方法。The runtime sets the attribute for a platform invoke method. ### 为的类型成员的方法Methods as members of types 一种方法指通过使用类型成员方法，它返回对象。A method is defined as a type member by using the method, which returns a object. 方法用于设置的名称和参数的参数属性或属性的返回值。The method is used to set the name and parameter attributes of a parameter, or of the return value. 此方法返回的对象表示的参数或返回值。The object returned by this method represents a parameter or the return value. 以设置封送处理、 设置常量值，以及要应用自定义特性，可以使用对象。The object can be used to set the marshaling, to set the constant value, and to apply custom attributes. ## 特性Attributes 成员枚举定义的动态方法的精确字符：Members of the enumeration define the precise character of a dynamic method: - 使用指定的静态方法属性。Static methods are specified using the attribute. - 使用最终方法 （不能重写的方法） 来指定属性。Final methods (methods that cannot be overridden) are specified using the attribute. - 虚方法使用指定属性。Virtual methods are specified using the attribute. - 抽象方法使用指定属性。Abstract methods are specified using the attribute. - 多个特性确定方法的可见性。Several attributes determine method visibility. 请参阅说明枚举。See the description of the enumeration. - 实现重载的运算符的方法必须设置属性。Methods that implement overloaded operators must set the attribute. - 终结器必须设置属性。Finalizers must set the attribute. ## 已知问题Known Issues - 尽管派生自，某些中定义的抽象方法类中未完全实现。Although is derived from , some of the abstract methods defined in the class are not fully implemented in . 这些方法将引发。These methods throw the . 例如方法未完全实现。For example the method is not fully implemented. 你可以通过检索封闭类型使用这些方法反映或方法。You can reflect on these methods by retrieving the enclosing type using the or methods. - 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始支持自定义修饰符。Custom modifiers are supported starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0. 在早期版本中不支持它们。They are not supported in earlier versions. ## Examples 下面的示例使用类，以创建一个动态类型中的方法。The following example uses the class to create a method within a dynamic type. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 向此方法添加声明性安全。

span.span: Adds declarative security to this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以调用多次，每次调用指定的安全操作 (如`Demand`， `Assert`，和`Deny`) 和一组应用此操作的权限。 can be called several times, with each call specifying a security action (such as `Demand`, `Assert`, and `Deny`) and a set of permissions that the action applies to. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 版本 1.0、 1.1 和 2.0 中，应用于方法时使用的声明性安全属性方法存储在旧的 XML 元数据格式。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0, 1.1, and 2.0, the declarative security attributes applied to a method by using the method are stored in the old XML metadata format. 请参阅发出的声明性安全属性。See Emitting Declarative Security Attributes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何上下文使用`AddDeclarativeSecurity`需要方法的调用方具有不受限制的权限。The code sample below illustrates the contextual use of `AddDeclarativeSecurity` to require the caller of a method to have unrestricted permissions. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.AddDeclarativeSecurity Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.AddDeclarativeSecurity Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.AddDeclarativeSecurity Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.AddDeclarativeSecurity Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.AddDeclarativeSecurity Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder.AddDeclarativeSecurity Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法使当前方法的泛型。Calling the method makes the current method generic. 没有要撤销此更改的方法。There is no way to undo this change. 第二次调用此方法会导致。Calling this method a second time causes an . 可以通过使用更高版本检索泛型方法的类型参数方法。The type parameters of the generic method can be retrieved later by using the method. 按照约定，类型参数名称是一个大写字母。By convention, a type parameter name is a single uppercase letter. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 。For more information, see and . 泛型类型的信息，请参阅。For information on generic types, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个动态类型， `DemoType`，其中包含动态泛型方法`DemoMethod`。The following code example creates a dynamic type, `DemoType`, which contains the dynamic generic method `DemoMethod`. 此方法具有两个泛型类型参数，其中之一用作参数，而另一个用作返回类型。This method has two generic type parameters, one of which is used as a parameter, and the other as the return type. 执行代码时，该动态程序集会另存为 DemoGenericMethod1.dll，使用 [Ildasm.exe（IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) 可以对其进行检查。When the code is executed, the dynamic assembly is saved as DemoGenericMethod1.dll, and can be examined using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md). > [!NOTE] > 此代码示例生成仅返回 null 引用的简单的方法体。This code example generates a simple method body that merely returns a null reference. 具有创建和使用泛型类型的多个完全开发的方法体的代码示例，请参阅[如何： 定义具有反射发出的泛型方法](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/how-to-define-a-generic-method-with-reflection-emit.md)。For a code example with a more fully developed method body that creates and uses generic types, see [How to: Define a Generic Method with Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/how-to-define-a-generic-method-with-reflection-emit.md). [!code-cpp[GenericMethodBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/GenericMethodBuilder/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[GenericMethodBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/GenericMethodBuilder/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GenericMethodBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/GenericMethodBuilder/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置参数的默认值或将应用自定义特性，可以使用此方法返回的对象。The object returned by this method can be used to set the default value for a parameter or to apply custom attributes. 参数编号从 1 开始，因此`position`对于第一个参数是 1。Parameter numbering begins with 1, so `position` is 1 for the first parameter. 如果`position`为零，则此方法会影响返回值。If `position` is zero, this method affects the return value. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，如果引发异常`position`为零，因此此方法不能用于修改在那些版本中的返回值的属性。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, an exception is thrown if `position` is zero, so this method cannot be used to modify attributes of the return value in those versions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该方法是静态的`obj`参数将被忽略。If the method is static, the `obj` parameter is ignored. 对于非静态方法，`obj`应是继承或声明方法并且必须是与此类的类型相同的类的实例。For non-static methods, `obj` should be an instance of a class that inherits or declares the method and must be the same type as this class. 如果该方法不具有任何参数，值`parameters`应`null`。If the method has no parameters, the value of `parameters` should be `null`. 否则数量、 类型和参数数组中的元素的顺序应该是数量、 类型和此实例反射的方法参数的顺序相同。Otherwise the number, type, and order of elements in the parameters array should be identical to the number, type, and order of parameters for the method reflected by this instance. > [!NOTE] > 访问限制会忽略完全受信任的代码。Access restrictions are ignored for fully-trusted code. 即私有构造函数、 方法、 字段和属性可以访问并调用完全信任代码时使用反射。That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using Reflection whenever the code is fully-trusted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在发出动态代码时，你可能需要发出从所表示的泛型方法定义构造的方法调用之前已完成的封闭类型。When you are emitting dynamic code, you might need to emit a call to a method constructed from the generic method definition represented by a , before the enclosing type has been completed. 你可以使用方法来创建此类的构造的方法，并使用发出的调用中。You can use the method to create a for such a constructed method, and use the in the emitted call. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建从完整的类型中不完整的泛型方法定义的构造的方法。The following code example creates a constructed method from an incomplete generic method definition in an incomplete type. 该示例创建了一个单一类型的瞬态程序集和模块，添加一个方法`M`，并使该方法由类型参数 T 使用添加泛型方法。The example creates a transient assembly and module with a single type, adds a method `M`, and makes the method generic by adding a type parameter T using the method. 作为该方法的参数的类型以及作为其返回类型，使用类型参数。The type parameter is used as the type of the method's parameter, and also as its return type. 泛型方法定义未给定主体，和未完成的封闭类型。The generic method definition is not given a body, and the enclosing type is not completed. 方法然后用于使构造的方法`M`(`M(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中)。The method is then used to make the constructed method `M` (`M(Of String)` in Visual Basic). 此代码示例具有任何输出，因为的子类返回方法不允许通过其参数的反射。The example code has no output, because the subclass of returned by the method does not allow reflection over its parameters. > [!NOTE] > 有关使用的另一个代码示例，请参阅。For another code example that uses , see . 也广泛时发出使用泛型类型的代码。 is also used extensively when emitting code that uses generic types. 请参阅[如何： 定义一个泛型方法，使用反射发出](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/how-to-define-a-generic-method-with-reflection-emit.md)。See [How to: Define a Generic Method with Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/how-to-define-a-generic-method-with-reflection-emit.md). [!code-cpp[MethodBuilder.MakeGenericMethod#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBuilder.MakeGenericMethod/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MethodBuilder.MakeGenericMethod#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBuilder.MakeGenericMethod/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MethodBuilder.MakeGenericMethod#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBuilder.MakeGenericMethod/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你使用方法结合方法，请注意可能的交互。When you use the method in combination with the method, be aware of potential interactions. 例如，使用方法将添加还属性集标志。For example, using the method to add the attribute also sets the flag. 如果您随后调用方法，覆盖标志。If you subsequently call the method, the flag is overwritten. 有两种方法来避免这种情况：There are two ways to avoid this: - 调用方法之前调用方法。Call the method before you call the method. 方法始终遵循现有的方法实现标志。The method always respects existing method implementation flags. - 当设置实现标志时，调用方法检索现有标志，请使用按位或以添加您的标志，然后调用方法。When you set implementation flags, call the method to retrieve the existing flags, use bitwise OR to add your flag, and then call the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何上下文使用`SetImplementationFlags`方法，用于描述在方法体中的 MSIL 实现。The code sample below illustrates the contextual use of the `SetImplementationFlags` method to describe the implementation of MSIL in a method body. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在定义方法时已知的数量和类型的参数，可以使用的任何重载设置接受的参数类型数组的方法。If the number and types of the parameters are known when the method is defined, they can be set using any overload of the method that accepts an array of parameter types. 但是，泛型方法可以具有其类型由一个或多个其自己的泛型类型参数，即后定义方法不能定义之前指定的参数。However, a generic method can have parameters whose types are specified by one or more of its own generic type parameters, which cannot be defined until after the method has been defined. 使用此方法在这种情况下设置的参数类型。Use this method to set the parameter types in that case. 如果返回类型具有可选或所需的自定义修饰符，如，使用方法重载。If the return type has optional or required custom modifiers, such as , use the method overload. 调用此方法将替换任何已设置使用的参数类型方法。Calling this method replaces any parameter types that were set using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法，以便泛型方法。The following code example uses the method to make a method generic. 方法用于为方法一个参数，其类型将由第一个泛型类型参数指定。The method is used to give the method one parameter, whose type will be specified by the first generic type parameter. 方法用于为第二个泛型类型参数所指定的返回类型的方法。The method is used to give the method a return type, specified by the second generic type parameter. 此代码摘自更大的示例为提供方法。This code is part of a larger example provided for the method. [!code-cpp[GenericMethodBuilder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/GenericMethodBuilder/cpp/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[GenericMethodBuilder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/GenericMethodBuilder/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[GenericMethodBuilder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/GenericMethodBuilder/VB/source.vb#3)] [!code-cpp[GenericMethodBuilder#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/GenericMethodBuilder/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[GenericMethodBuilder#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/GenericMethodBuilder/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[GenericMethodBuilder#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/GenericMethodBuilder/VB/source.vb#5)]

summary.span: 设置方法签名，包括返回类型、参数类型以及返回类型和参数类型所需和可选的自定义修饰符。

span.span: Sets the method signature, including the return type, the parameter types, and the required and optional custom modifiers of the return type and parameter types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果返回类型的数量和类型的参数已知时定义方法，可以使用的任何重载建立接受的参数类型数组的方法。If the return type and the number and types of the parameters are known when the method is defined, they can be established using any overload of the method that accepts an array of parameter types. 但是，泛型方法可以具有其类型由一个或多个其自己的泛型类型参数，即后定义方法不能定义之前指定的参数。However, a generic method can have parameters whose types are specified by one or more of its own generic type parameters, which cannot be defined until after the method has been defined. 使用此方法在这种情况下设置的参数类型。Use this method to set the parameter types in that case. 如果返回类型和参数类型都不具有可选或所需的自定义修饰符，如，你可以使用和方法。If neither the return type nor the parameter types have optional or required custom modifiers, such as , you can use the and methods. 调用此方法取代了参数和返回类型建立使用方法。Calling this method replaces the parameters and return type established using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例包含一个名为示例，具有类型参数的泛型类的源代码`T`。The following code example contains source code for a generic class named Sample that has a type parameter `T`. 此类具有名为的字段`Field`，类型的`T`，和泛型方法`GM`包含其自身类型参数， `U`。The class has a field named `Field`, of type `T`, and a generic method `GM` with its own type parameter, `U`. 方法`GM`创建的示例中，其自身类型参数替换实例`U`为类型参数的示例中，并将存储在其输入的参数`Field`。Method `GM` creates an instance of Sample, substituting its own type parameter `U` for the type parameter of Sample, and stores its input parameter in `Field`. 编译但不是使用此类源代码你可以查看其与[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，并将其与发出的类的代码比较`Example`。This source code is compiled but not used; you can view it with the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), and compare it to the code emitted by class `Example`. 类中的代码`Example`演示如何使用发出泛型代码中的方法。The code in class `Example` demonstrates the use of the method in emitting generic code. `Main`类的方法`Example`创建动态程序集包含一个名为类`Sample`，并使用方法，以使泛型通过添加一个名为的类型参数`T`。The `Main` method of class `Example` creates a dynamic assembly containing a class named `Sample`, and uses the method to make it generic by adding a type parameter named `T`. 默认构造函数和一个名为字段`Field`，类型的`T`，添加到类`Sample`。A default constructor and a field named `Field`, of type `T`, are added to class `Sample`. 一种方法`GM`添加，并对其转变为泛型方法使用方法。A method `GM` is added, and turned into a generic method using the method. 类型参数`GM`名为`U`。The type parameter of `GM` is named `U`. 定义类型参数后, 的签名`GM`使用的添加方法。Once the type parameter is defined, the signature of `GM` is added, using the method. 没有没有返回类型，而且没有所需的或自定义修饰符，因此此方法的所有参数都是`null`除`parameterTypes`，这会设置方法的唯一参数的类型; 此值设置为该方法的类型参数， `U`。There is no return type, and no required or custom modifiers, so all the parameters of this method are `null` except `parameterTypes`, which sets the type of the only parameter of the method; this is set to the method's type parameter, `U`. 方法的主体创建的构造类型的实例`Sample`(`Sample(Of U)`在 Visual Basic 中)，将分配到该方法的参数`Field`，，然后输出的值`Field`。The body of the method creates an instance of the constructed type `Sample` (`Sample(Of U)` in Visual Basic), assigns the method's parameter to `Field`, and then prints the value of `Field`. 一个虚拟类型定义，以容纳入口点方法`Main`。A dummy type is defined, to hold the entry point method `Main`. 正文中`Main`，静态`GM`方法调用的构造泛型类型上`Sample`(`Sample(Of Integer)`在 Visual Basic 中)，与类型替换为`U`。In the body of `Main`, the static `GM` method is invoked on the constructed generic type `Sample` (`Sample(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), with type substituted for `U`. 方法用于创建适用于静态`GM`构造的泛型类型的方法`Sample`，和方法然后用于创建，可以在方法调用中发出。The method is used to create a for the static `GM` method of the constructed generic type `Sample`, and the method is then used to create a that can emitted in a method call. 当运行时的代码示例时，它将发出的程序集保存为 TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe。When the code example is run, it saves the emitted assembly as TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe. 你可以运行 TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe，并可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)要比较的代码发出的代码`Sample`编译到其自身的代码示例的类。You can run TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe, and you can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to compare the emitted code with the code for the `Sample` class that is compiled into the code example itself. [!code-csharp[TypeBuilder.GetField_Generic#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder.GetField_Generic/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TypeBuilder.GetField_Generic#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder.GetField_Generic/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 像元数据自定义属性，此自定义属性与器关联的符号编写器。Unlike the metadata custom attribute, this custom attribute is associated with a symbol writer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的上下文用法`SetSymCustomAttribute`方法以设置的名称和密钥的自定义属性的字节值附加到一种方法。The code sample below illustrates the contextual usage of the `SetSymCustomAttribute` method to set the byte values for the name and key of a custom attribute attached to a method.
